channel.title: artificial-intelligence on Matt Evans
channel.description: Recent content in artificial-intelligence on Matt Evans

item.title: What Will AI Not Consume? Strategically Placing Oneself For the New Era.
item.description: AI is not just a buzzword. To be sure, as to the words, it is nonsense: there is no intelligence, but mere pattern matching and extrapolation. Well, call that intelligence if you will; I won’t. But the effects of AI cannot be downplayed and should not be ignored by anyone in a technical discipline not wanting to be left behind. If you work in any of these industries, I believe it’s very possible that AI is coming to eat your lunch:
